definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)

sentences.english: Metronomes should not be over used.
sentences.chinese: 节拍器也不应当被滥用。

sentences.english: From hip-pop to the non-stop rhythm of the city.
sentences.chinese: 从嘻哈音乐到永无休止的城市节拍。

sentences.english: A metronome might be used for this gradual speed-up.
sentences.chinese: 在慢慢增加速度的时候，节拍器也常被用到。
那节拍器摆动着显示节拍。
那节拍器摆动着显示节拍。

sentences.english: We stood, waited for the beat, and tried again.
sentences.chinese: 我们站住，等待合适的节拍，接着跳。

sentences.english: The song has a syncopated rhythm in the jazz version.
sentences.chinese: 这首歌曲改编为爵士乐后接纳了切分音节拍。

sentences.english: The primitive dance also has the metre which raps or sings toaccompany with.
sentences.chinese: 原始的舞蹈也有敲击出来的节拍或歌唱相伴和。

sentences.english: This is used to provide note values, as well as creating a basic tempo dictation.
sentences.chinese: 这可用于提供通知值，以及创建基本的节拍命令。

sentences.english: It’s not the same beats season after season.
sentences.chinese: 它每一季的节拍都不相同。

sentences.english: She had millions of listeners snapping their fingers to her first single…
sentences.chinese: 百万听众和着她第一首歌的节拍打着响指。

sentences.english: GigBaby! four track recorder, metronome, drum machine.
sentences.chinese: 四轨录音机，节拍器，鼓机。
节拍器能够拯救你的生命。

sentences.english: What are the distinctions between figural and metric structures?
sentences.chinese: 在音形和节拍的结构间的差异是什么？

sentences.english: As the music beats, the shirts equalizer lights up to the beat of the music.
sentences.chinese: 随着音乐的不同节拍，汗衫上的均衡器就会随之亮起。

definition: (music) note/phonetic component of a Chinese character/phonetic symbol/phonogram
to beat time/to mark rhythm on drum or clapper boards
